name: Glass Houses
description:
An arcade game about throwing stones, created in 1981. 

Oh no!  Squor and Tring are arguing about politics again!  Squor keeps lobbing threats and insults at Tring’s fragile psyche!  Your job is to build walls of facts and logic to protect Tring.  If his psyche gets hit too often, he’ll pass out from stress.  And Squor can’t keep this up forever … can he?

Controls:  Arrow keys to move the wall builder; space to build a wall; Q to quit.

Credits:  Programming and art by B.J. Best.  Sound by Facemelting Solos.  Fonts:  Display:  Astronaut.  Text:  Gamer.  Created for the Dream Arcade Archive.
